Additional Notes: Transitions to Jab 2 as early as frame 12
Transitions to Jab 3 as early as frame 8.
Only hits targets above him on 15

Transitions to second swing as early as frame 22. Sword beam active frames 19-58. 
Charge hold frame is 9

Autocancels on frame 1-9 and 65 onward. 
Can hit same target once again after 30 frames due to pogo effect

Reaches full charge on 52 Arrows travel for 46 frames after being fired. And will stick into the ground 
for 3 seconds. When firing two arrows at once, the second one generates three frames after the first
9 frame animation of catching boomerang if no other action is being performed.
Can charge attack for an additional 60 frames. Startup is 4 from charge state.
Link is not immune to his own bombs.
